title: clean, but bubbly font
content:
[http://i107.photobucket.com/albums/m282/iDoof/organism.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090502142410/http:/i107.photobucket.com/albums/m282/iDoof/organism.png)

I like that this has that circular, bubbly feel, but still looks professional. Can you give me either the exact font or something close?

Thanks!!
author: iDoof

comments.content:
[Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20090502142410/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=bauhaus&x=0&y=0) or [Moderna](http://web.archive.org/web/20090502142410/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?key=FOLI-MODE&preadd=action) would be close.

[Egret](http://web.archive.org/web/20090502142410/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/device_fonts/egret_light) is less so, but very stylish.
